message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $1000000. I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be very valuable to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  Let's try $950000. This reflects the true value of the product, and I believe it's still a great deal for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $900000. I hope this aligns better with our discussions.
